cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: {d}utu ud5#?-sag mah x x x geš#? x x-⸢a⸣ AŠ e3
en gal mu dugud-da-a-ni a-re-eš dab#? ni2 su-zi ri-a
di-ku5 mah inim-bi sag ba-gub geš-la2-bi u18-ru
en utah-he-ta e3-a-ni ku10-ku10 zalag-ge ki bar-ra-ka ib-gar-ra
šul ur-sag geš gal-bi un3-na še-er-bi? gal gir2
a-zu gal ki dingir-a-na šu2-a-aš umuš galga šum2-mu
lugal-gu10-ra u3-na-a-du11
dingir zi na de5 an-ki he-nun si sa2-sa2-e
du5? pirig-ga2 igi kar2 sig#? igi-nim-ma palil e2?-gal x [...] x
en ka-aš bar-ra kilib3 ⸢dingir⸣ gal-e#?-⸢ne⸣ KA-ga-ni [...]
nun sag il2 ⸢ušum⸣ kur-ra#? za3#? dab dili-ta ⸢mu⸣-[...]
sipa kalam-ma zi#?-de3?-eš DU-DU#?-DU šid?-ni#? [...]
dingir ša3-la2 tuku x TUR? a-ra-zu-a nig2-si-sa2 [...]
lugal-gu10 inim ku3-zu ⸢he2⸣-⸢UD⸣-x [...]
i-si-iš nam-tag zi ir [...] ba-an-gar-ra du11-ga-zu-ta ⸢he2⸣-x-x u4-šu2-uš he2-bi2-x-[...]-ge?
im-gid2-da {diš}{d}nanna-me-a-ša4 <u4> 2(u) 2(diš)-kam ba-zal
